page.title: 12The Army Training Centre
page.content: The army training centre is on the outskirts of Warcop. It is used by different regiments to train soldiers in using small arms, tanks and artillery. Sometimes it can get very noisy and the school shakes when the larger guns are fired. But you soon get used to it. Our D-block has part of the firing range on it. The centre takes up to 600 soldiers. The army want to buy another part of the fell to use as a training ground, but some people are organizing a protest committee to try and stop them. They say that the army will spoil the countryside. But the centre provides some work for people in Warcop,and the soldiers spend a lot of money in the shops and the pub. The army also own some of the farmland, and let farmers use it.
